mysql> select  TRUNCATE(SUBSTRING(comment, 1, 3), 0) as img
    ->         ,htmid
    ->         ,ra
    ->         ,truncate(((ra/360)*24),0) as "ra(h)"
    ->         ,truncate(((ra/360)*24 - truncate(((ra/360)*24),0))*60,0) as "ra(m)"
    ->         ,truncate((((ra/360)*24 - truncate(((ra/360)*24),0))*60 - truncate(((ra/360)*24 - truncate(((ra/360)*24),0))*60,0))*60,2) as "ra(s)"
    ->         ,decl
    ->         ,truncate(decl,0) as "dec(deg)"
    ->         ,truncate((decl - truncate(decl,0))*60,0) as "dec(min)"
    ->         ,truncate(((decl - truncate(decl,0))*60 - truncate((decl - truncate(decl,0))*60,0))*60,1) as "dec(sec)"
    ->         ,flux_max
    ->         ,flux_iso
    ->         ,flux_isocor
    -> --      ,flux_auto
    -> --      ,flux_aper
    ->         ,fluxrms_max as flux_rms
    -> --      ,fluxrms_iso
    -> --      ,fluxrms_isocor
    -> --      ,fluxrms_auto
    -> --      ,fluxrms_aper
    -> --      ,flux_isoadj
    -> --      ,isoareaf_image
    -> --      ,(flux_isoadj/isoareaf_image) as "flux_new"
    ->   from lofarcatrun04
    -> order by img;
+------+----------+---------------+-------+-------+-------+-----------------+----------+----------+----------+---------------+---------------+---------------+----------------+
